By default, the address is generated in: By default, the address is generated in a random group. You can select the group you want the address to be generated in using the Advanced options.
Please choose whether you want to create: Please choose whether you want to create a new wallet or import an existing one.
Amount must be greater than {{ minAmount: Amount must be greater than {{ minAmountInAlph }}
Could not connect to the {{ currentNetwo: Could not connect to the {{ currentNetwork }} network.
Note that if activated, \"{{ name }}\" w: Note that if activated, "{{ name }}" will not be the main address anymore.
Note that if activated, \"{{ address }}: Note that if activated, "{{ address }}" will not be the main address anymore.
Gas amount must be greater than {{ MINIM: Gas amount must be greater than {{ MINIMAL_GAS_AMOUNT }}.
Gas price must be greater than {{ amount: Gas price must be greater than {{ amount }}
The easiest way to get started with Alep: The easiest way to get started with Alephium.
There are no addresses with available ba: There are no addresses with available balance. Please, send some funds to one of your addresses, and try again.
Could not fetch data because the wallet: Could not fetch data because the wallet is offline
To remove this address from being the ma: To remove this address from being the main address, you must set another one as main first.
Sweep all the unlocked funds of this add: Sweep all the unlocked funds of this address to another address.
Select the address to sweep the funds fr: Select the address to sweep the funds from.
Select the address to sweep the funds to: Select the address to sweep the funds to.
sweepOperationFromTo: This operation will sweep all funds from <1>{{ from }}</1> and transfer them to <3>{{ to }}</3>.
The group number will be automatically b: The group number will be automatically be appended to the addresses’ label.
Type your password to show your secret p: Type your password to show your secret phrase.
Carefully note down the words! They are: Carefully note down the words! They are the secret keys to your wallet.
No secret phrase was stored along with t: No secret phrase was stored along with this wallet
Select the address to send funds from.
Enter your password to send the transact: Enter your password to send the transaction.
Duration in minutes after which an idle: Duration in minutes after which an idle wallet will lock automatically.
Select the theme and please your eyes.
Require password confirmation before sen: Require password confirmation before sending each transaction.
Type your password to change this settin: Type your password to change this setting.
Make sure to always check what is the se: Make sure to always check what is the selected network before sending transactions.
Version {{ newVersion }} is available. P: Version {{ newVersion }} is available. Please, download it and install it to avoid any issues with wallet.
Please make sure to have your secret phr: Please make sure to have your secret phrase saved and stored somewhere secure to restore your wallet in the future. Without the secret phrase, your wallet will be unrecoverable and permanently lost.
Not your keys, not your coins.
Useful for miners or DeFi use.
You have great ideas you want to share?: You have great ideas you want to share?
Alright! Time to check if you got your w: Alright! Time to check if you got your words right!

Something went wrong when creating encry: Something went wrong when creating encrypted wallet.
Select the words in the right order.
It seems like you made a mistake in the: It seems like you made a mistake in the words' order. But don't worry, you can reorder the words by dragging them around.
Great job! Remember to keep those words: Great job! Remember to keep those words safe.
Make sure to keep your password secured: Make sure to keep your password secured as it cannot be changed in the future.
Alephium doesn't have access to your wal:
Alephium doesn't have access to your wallet.
You are the only owner.
Make sure to properly write down the wor: Make sure to properly write down the words in a secure location! They are the secret key to your wallet.
welcomeScreenOneAddressPerGroupMessage: Advanced user: want to start with <1>one address per group for mining or DeFi?</1>
Advanced operations reserved to more exp: Advanced operations reserved to more experienced users. A "normal" user should not need to use them very often, if not at all.
It appears that your wallet has too many: It appears that your wallet has too many UTXOs to be able to send this transaction. Please, consolidate (merge) your UTXOs first. This will cost a small fee.
Please choose a wallet and enter your pa: Please choose a wallet and enter your password to continue.
